thread.section_title: Hotel Lorette - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A nice surprise beyond expectations!
thread.title_full: A nice surprise beyond expectations! - Review of Hotel Lorette - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: chiara_org
title: A nice surprise beyond expectations!
text:
I was so positively impressed by Hotel Lorette! the staff is kind and always helpful, the hall very luminous and spacious and well served with a rich open bar till night..perfect place for relax and stay! Rooms are also quite big for Parisian standard, functional and well curated.
Even if is above the underground ( which by the way makes the location central and strategical) the noises and vibes didn't bother me or disturb my sleep.
Great discover, i will surely come back!
Room Tip: get upper floor and if possible rooms facing the narrow street behind main entrance! See more room tips
